0: In March, we learned that Mike Flynn worked as a paid lobbyist for Turkey while advising then-candidate Trump during the campaign. After Trump won in November, and Flynn promptly shut down his lobbying firm, Flynn’s lawyers disclosed to Trump’s transition team, on two separate occasions, that Lt. Gen. Flynn—who was in line to be Trump’s national security adviser—had worked for the Turks. The Trump team apparently didn’t care.
